;;;408

;;;421      while (!(LPC_SC->PLL0STAT & (1<<26)));/* Wait for PLOCK0                    */

;;;422

000050  f8402f80          STR      r2,[r0,#0x80]!

000054  60c3              STR      r3,[r0,#0xc]
;;;425      LPC_SC->PLL0FEED  = 0x55;

;;;426    #endif
;;;427    
;;;428    #if (PLL1_SETUP)
;;;429      LPC_SC->PLL1CFG   = PLL1CFG_Val;
;;;430      LPC_SC->PLL1CON   = 0x01;             /* PLL1 Enable                        */
;;;431      LPC_SC->PLL1FEED  = 0xAA;
;;;432      LPC_SC->PLL1FEED  = 0x55;
;;;433      while (!(LPC_SC->PLL1STAT & (1<<10)));/* Wait for PLOCK1                    */
;;;434    
;;;435      LPC_SC->PLL1CON   = 0x03;             /* PLL1 Enable & Connect              */

;;;437      LPC_SC->PLL1FEED  = 0x55;

;;;442      LPC_SC->PCONP     = PCONP_Val;        /* Power Control for Peripherals      */

;;;444      LPC_SC->CLKOUTCFG = CLKOUTCFG_Val;    /* Clock Output Configuration         */

;;;446    
;;;447      /* Determine clock frequency according to clock register values             */
;;;448      if (((LPC_SC->PLL0STAT >> 24)&3)==3) {/* If PLL0 enabled and connected      */

00006e  0792              LSLS     r2,r2,#30
;;;449        switch (LPC_SC->CLKSRCSEL & 0x03) {
;;;450          case 0:                           /* Internal RC oscillator => PLL0     */
;;;451          case 3:                           /* Reserved, default to Internal RC   */
;;;452            SystemFrequency = (IRC_OSC * 
000070  492f              LDR      r1,|L1.304|
;;;453                              ((2 * ((LPC_SC->PLL0STAT & 0x7FFF) + 1)))  /
;;;454                              (((LPC_SC->PLL0STAT >> 16) & 0xFF) + 1)    /
;;;455                              ((LPC_SC->CCLKCFG & 0xFF)+ 1));
;;;456            break;
;;;457          case 1:                           /* Main oscillator => PLL0            */
;;;458            SystemFrequency = (OSC_CLK * 
;;;459                              ((2 * ((LPC_SC->PLL0STAT & 0x7FFF) + 1)))  /
;;;460                              (((LPC_SC->PLL0STAT >> 16) & 0xFF) + 1)    /
;;;461                              ((LPC_SC->CCLKCFG & 0xFF)+ 1));
;;;462            break;
;;;463          case 2:                           /* RTC oscillator => PLL0             */
;;;464            SystemFrequency = (RTC_CLK * 
;;;465                              ((2 * ((LPC_SC->PLL0STAT & 0x7FFF) + 1)))  /
;;;466                              (((LPC_SC->PLL0STAT >> 16) & 0xFF) + 1)    /
;;;467                              ((LPC_SC->CCLKCFG & 0xFF)+ 1));

;;;470      } else {
;;;471        switch (LPC_SC->CLKSRCSEL & 0x03) {

0000a0  f3c24207          UBFX     r2,r2,#16,#8          ;452
0000a4  1c52              ADDS     r2,r2,#1              ;452
0000a6  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3                 ;452
0000a8  1c5b              ADDS     r3,r3,#1              ;452

0000b2  e00b              B        |L1.204|
                  |L1.180|

0000c0  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3                 ;458
0000c2  1c5b              ADDS     r3,r3,#1              ;458
0000c4  435a              MULS     r2,r3,r2              ;458
0000c6  f8503988          LDR      r3,[r0],#-0x88        ;458
0000ca  4c1b              LDR      r4,|L1.312|
                  |L1.204|
0000cc  f3c3030e          UBFX     r3,r3,#0,#15          ;452
0000d0  1c5b              ADDS     r3,r3,#1              ;452
0000d2  4363              MULS     r3,r4,r3              ;452
0000d4  e01c              B        |L1.272|
                  |L1.214|
0000d6  f8502f88          LDR      r2,[r0,#0x88]!        ;464

0000ec  f44f447a          MOV      r4,#0xfa00            ;464

                  |L1.242|
0000f2  e7ff              B        |L1.244|
                  |L1.244|
;;;472          case 0:                           /* Internal RC oscillator => PLL0     */
;;;473          case 3:                           /* Reserved, default to Internal RC   */
;;;474            SystemFrequency = IRC_OSC / ((LPC_SC->CCLKCFG & 0xFF)+ 1);

;;;475            break;
0000fa  e007              B        |L1.268|

;;;476          case 1:                           /* Main oscillator => PLL0            */
;;;477            SystemFrequency = OSC_CLK / ((LPC_SC->CCLKCFG & 0xFF)+ 1);

;;;480            SystemFrequency = RTC_CLK / ((LPC_SC->CCLKCFG & 0xFF)+ 1);

000114  600a              STR      r2,[r1,#0]  ; SystemFrequency

;;;481            break;
;;;482        }
;;;483      }
;;;484    
;;;485    #if (FLASH_SETUP == 1)                  /* Flash Accelerator Setup            */
;;;486      LPC_SC->FLASHCFG  = (LPC_SC->FLASHCFG & ~0x0000F000) | FLASHCFG_Val;

000118  f4214170          BIC      r1,r1,#0xf000

000120  6001              STR      r1,[r0,#0]
;;;487    #endif
;;;488    }
000122  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
